description:
Fresh EDP 100ML - Rejuvenating Aquatic Elegance

Discover the invigorating essence of Fresh EDP, a captivating unisex fragrance that embodies pure vitality and crisp elegance. This 100ML eau de parfum transports you to a serene oasis where citrus groves meet cool ocean breezes. âœ¨

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
100ML Unisex Eau de Parfum High Luxury Collection

Exquisite Fresh Fragrance Notes

Top Notes Bergamot, Lemon Zest, Sea Salt, Green Apple
Heart Notes Jasmine, Lily of the Valley, Ocean Accord, Fresh Mint
Base Notes White Musk, Cedarwood, Amber, Light Vetiver

Key Features of Fresh EDP

  • ðŸŒ¿ Long-lasting aquatic fragrance with exceptional sillage
  • ðŸŒ¸ Perfect balance of citrus, floral, and marine accords
  • ðŸ’Ž Versatile scent suitable for day-to-night wear
  • ðŸ”¥ Sophisticated glass bottle with minimalist design
  • ðŸ’« Ideal for warm weather and professional settings

The Fresh EDP story begins with master perfumers seeking to capture the essence of pristine coastal mornings. Drawing inspiration from the Mediterranean shoreline, this aquatic fragrance combines traditional perfumery techniques with modern molecular science. The result is a contemporary classic that stands apart in the crowded luxury fragrance market.

The opening notes of Fresh EDP burst with invigorating citrus, creating an immediate sensation of cleanliness and energy. As the fragrance develops, delicate florals and a distinctive marine accord emerge, evoking images of sun-dappled waves and sea-kissed breezes. The sophisticated dry down reveals warm musky notes anchored by subtle woods, ensuring this premium perfume maintains its elegant character throughout the day.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Fresh EDP last on skin?
Fresh EDP offers exceptional longevity for an aquatic fragrance, typically lasting 7-9 hours on skin. The high-quality concentration ensures the scent evolves beautifully throughout the day, with the marine and citrus notes remaining detectable for the first 3-4 hours, while the sophisticated musk and amber base notes can be enjoyed for many hours after application. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin. âœ¨

Experience the refreshing elegance of Fresh EDP 100ML â€“ where crisp vitality meets sophisticated depth in a premium fragrance experience. ðŸŒ¿
short_description: Experience the invigorating blend of citrus brightness and aquatic freshness with Fresh EDP 100ML. This premium unisex fragrance combines zesty bergamot, oceanic accords, and sophisticated white musk for a rejuvenating scent experience that transitions effortlessly from day to evening.
